name: Parasite P373
description:
Controls

Control with WASD, Exit human with SPACE, Charge jump with SPACE

Gameplay

You play as Parasite P373, and your goal is to escape the lab that the humans keep you in. In order to survive you will need to take over human’s, you can’t survive too long in parasite and human state tho, so you need to switch between forms to stay alive. Escape without getting spotted! The easiest way to escape is to ████ ███ ███ ████ ████ ██ ████ █ ██████ ███ ███ ██ ███ █ ███████ ██ ████

Credits

Game made by:

  • One Game Designer       (ijslapje)
  • Two Programmers         (Optioneel, Minibeau)
  • Two Asset Makers        (Neonpuncher, Casper)
  • One Musician            (Dax)
  • Motivational Speaker    (Jesse)
  • And three cats          (Jimmy, Herman and Sylphyxia)

 

All Code, Assets, Sounds and Music was made in 48 hours!

Keep in mind, the game could have some bugs because it was made in such a short time. The UI is in this version with text, but if we develop the game further in the future this and many more things will change! Please comment what you would like to see and if you like this game concept!
